Text to display in the widget header. Change using msg.title.

Info text to display in (i) pop-up. Change using msg.popup_info.

Number to append, array to replace. Change using msg.payload.

Line color. Change using msg.color.

Solid fill from the line down. Change using msg.fill_color.

Change using msg.text_color.

Display last value. Change using msg.show_value.

Change using msg.unit.
